practice_phrases: I knew that
Sabía que
I knew that too
Sabía eso
I knew that was a mistake
Sabía que era un error
I knew that was very near
Sabía que estaba muy cerca
I knew that since a long time ago
Sabía eso desde hace mucho tiempo
I knew that was where your house was
Sabía que era donde estaba tu casa
I knew that you thought it was a mistake
Sabía que pensaste que era un error
I knew that probably would have been a mistake
Sabía que probablemente habría un error
I knew that we would have bought something there
Sabía que habríamos comprado algo allí
I knew that was the last time we saw each other
Sabía que era última vez nos vimos

seed_context.known: I knew that the children had broken it.
seed_context.target: Sabía que los niños lo habían roto.
